title: Graph Theory
description: Fundamentals, connectivity, matchings, colorings, extremal problems, Ramsey theory, planar graphs, perfect graphs. Applications to operations research and the design of efficient algorithms.

prerequisites: MATH 4022 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
